text: Liliana Cavani (born 12 January 1933) This site uses Cavani's birth certificate as its source of information. is an Italian movie director and screenwriter. She is known for her 1974 movie Il portiere di notte (The Night Porter).Brunetta, The History of Italian Cinema, p. 227 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian screenwriters
title: Liliana Cavani
